text: I will praise you, O LORD, with my whole heart; I will tell of all Your marvelous works.

segments.phrase: I will praise you, O LORD, with my whole heart
I will tell of all Your marvelous works

spoken_lines.speaker: son
spoken_lines.line: When you remember what I've already done, fear loses its grip on your ribs.

spoken_lines.speaker: spirit
spoken_lines.line: Testimony calms the nervous system. Gratitude is not fake — it's regulation.

body_note: Heart + diaphragm open instead of holding panic. Spine straightens in confidence instead of curling in shame.

text: I will be glad and rejoice in You; I will sing praise to Your name, O Most High.

segments.phrase: I will be glad and rejoice in You
I will sing praise to Your name, O Most High

spoken_lines.speaker: fruit
spoken_lines.line: Joy is not pretending. Joy is letting light back into the chest.

spoken_lines.speaker: might
spoken_lines.line: Stand planted. You are not prey. You belong to the Most High.

body_note: Feet and stance come back under you. Your body remembers 'I live under Someone bigger than my threat'.
